job description:
Machine Learning Engineer
Based in downtown Boston we are a rapidly growing, well-financed, AI powered and dynamic start-up(been around for a few years) looking to build our engineering team.

If you are a Data Scientist with 5+ years of experience, please read on!

Top Reasons to Work with Us
  • Get in early with a growth mode start-up in the AI space
  • Our product helps and saves millions of company's hours per year in finding key contract data for audits and other diligence
  • Competitive Base + Bonus + The chance to work closely with the CTO to shape the technical direction of our company moving forward
What You Will Be Doing
Develop NLP systems that help our customers understand their contracts
Work with a wide range of structured and unstructured data sets and sources
Design and build customized, large scale cloud-based machine learning systems

What You Need for this Position
Strong software development skills and background
Background and experience in NLP
Strong programming background in Python or similar scripting / programming language
Object-oriented programming
In-depth knowledge of testing frameworks

So, if you are a Senior Data Scientist with 5+ years of experience, please send over an updated resume to me at ben.stehle@cybercoders.com to learn more!
  • Applicants must be authorized to work in the U.S.

    CyberCoders, Inc is proud to be an Equal Opportunity Employer
All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, national origin, disability, protected veteran status, or any other characteristic protected by law.

Your Right to Work In compliance with federal law, all persons hired will be required to verify identity and eligibility to work in the United States and to complete the required employment eligibility verification document form upon hire.
